channel.title: Test with weird dates.
channel.description: Test feed with weird date problems.

item.title: missing date
item.description: This item has no date but there's one on the feed to fallback on

item.title: missing space
item.description: This item has a date that feedparser has trouble with, probably because of the missing space between the day of week and date

item.title: no timezone
item.description: This item has a date that feedparser has trouble with, maybe because of the missing timezone
